plain: The user's favourite genre is likely to be fiction, as all of the books mentioned are works of fiction. The user's favourite kind of plot is likely to be character-driven, as all of the books mentioned focus on the development of the protagonist. The user's favourite setting is likely to be a fictional one, as all of the books mentioned take place in fictional locations. The user's favourite writing style is likely to be descriptive, as all of the books mentioned are richly detailed. The user's favourite length is likely to be novel-length, as all of the books mentioned are full-length novels. The user's favourite topic is likely to be coming-of-age, as all of the books mentioned deal with the theme of growing up. The user's favourite pacing is likely to be slow and steady, as all of the books mentioned take their time in developing their stories. The user's favourite narrative structure is likely to be third-person omniscient, as all of the books mentioned are told from an outside perspective. The user's favourite themes are likely to be identity, belonging, and self-discovery, as all of the books mentioned deal with these themes in some way.
